meanings.definition: Resistant to fading or changing color when exposed to light.
meanings.sent1: The lightfast paint on the wall stayed vibrant even after years of sunlight exposure.
meanings.sent2: Artists prefer using lightfast materials to ensure their work remains colorful over time.
meanings.sent3: The lightfast flowers in the garden seemed to be showing off their ability to resist the sun's rays.
meanings.sent4: Her lightfast personality shone brightly, never dimming even in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The lightfast fabric of the curtains kept its rich hue despite being in direct sunlight for hours.
